name: Car Racing for Toddlers and Kids under 6 Free with Animals
name_original: Car Racing for Toddlers and Kids under 6 Free with Animals
description:
A fun and colorful car racing game for children from 2 years that will keep your child entertained.
It’s just like watching a cartoon but children can interact with the game to win their first races!

Recommended for children 2-4 years of age, the game play was designed to encourage little kids to be attentive on roads as well as develop leadership qualities.


Key features:

- An expansive collection of cars for hours of game play, 5 cars for free, no limits in gameplay

- Intuitive user interface and touch control

- Animated images and sound, cute animals drivers

- A winner gets a nice cup with a special car prize

- All prizes collected in a special screen and you can choose and go racing on prize cars


Try the game for free!

Full content with new and updated cars and vehicles can be downloaded within the app. To safeguard against accidental in-app purchases, the user must correctly solve a skill testing math problem to proceed.


Game Play

It’s possible for toddler to cross the finish line watching the game as a cartoon but chances to win substantially increase if you interact with the game. Kids don’t have to decide on how to overcome the obstacles on the way. Instead, they should pay attention to difficulties that appear on the road and tap them while the car teaches your child the best way to come through. This makes the game entertaining and easy enough to play for preschool children.
